page.title: 03ATTITUDES:ASHLEWORTH
page.content: There is a fair amount of{development going on in Ashleworth which is changing it's role to a commuter village.This is causing concern among the established {population}for two reasons.Firstly,the new housing is all very expensive and there is no development suitable for the young local people to buy and consequently they are having to move away.Secondly a lot of the new-comers are not showing much interest in village life which could,in the long run, affect the way of life of the village.The need for change in{attitudes}and growth in Ashleworth is accepted but more interest should be taken by the established population in seeing that it is suitable and more participation in {village life}should be undertaken by the new-comers. { }
